arts.ttl: Watch: Cesar Azpilicueta’s Goal of the Season contender
arts.sum: Cesar Azpilicueta does not score many goals. Before this weekend, the Spanish full-back had managed just 20 goals in 752 previous club appearances. He’d never scored a goal in La Liga and was fast approaching 50 games for Atletico Madrid without finding the net. Until now. The 35-year-old opened the scoring against Espanyol on Saturday […] The post Watch: Cesar Azpilicueta’s Goal of the Season contender first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Arsenal Transfer News: Gunners hope top target Joan Garcia gets relegated
arts.sum: Arsenal have been left hoping that top goalkeeper target Joan Garcia suffers relegation as it would result in a significant reduction to his release clause, according to Spanish media. Espanyol have already conceded that they will likely have to sell Garcia to balance the books this summer and they will be open to negotiating a price that is lower than his release clause.
